title: WTB: Elmer Flick, low grade, slab not required
author: Centauri

posts.post_title: WTB: Elmer Flick, low grade, slab not required
posts.post_content: I am putting together a set of Cleveland Indians team HOF cards. Looking for 1 example of each player during their time a Cleveland player. I would consider any Flick card, but the T206 seems to be the most likely option. There is one on eBay for $100 which I am close to pulling the trigger on, but thought I would check here first. Maybe the eBay listing is someone here who would be interested in saving some fees.
